name: Trenches of Love
description:
Trenches of Love is an entry for the UE4 2019 Winter Game Jam.  Developed by Tyler Cowan and Roger Bilodeau; the theme was "All's Fair In Love And War".  

Graphics styled in the spirit of lat 1990's and early 2000's games.

Trenches of Love is an old-school styled game about love in the trenches. Maneuver through the battlefield and spread some love by smooching those handsome faces.

Trenches of Love is less than 100mb.
